mapper.insert: insert into t_info_lesson_fee ( lsn_fee_id, lesson_id, pay_style, lsn_fee, lsn_month, own_flg ) values ( #{lsnFeeId}, #{lessonId}, #{payStyle}, #{lsnFee}, #{lsnMonth}, #{ownFlg} )
mapper.delete: delete from t_info_lesson_fee where lsn_fee_id = #{lsnFeeId} and lesson_id = #{lessonId}
mapper.select: SELECT subject_id,subject_name, SUM(lsn_count0) AS total_lsn_count0, SUM(lsn_count1) AS total_lsn_count1, SUM(lsn_count2) AS total_lsn_count2, lsn_month FROM (SELECT subject_id,subject_name, CASE WHEN lesson_type = 0 THEN lsn_count ELSE 0 END AS lsn_count0, CASE WHEN lesson_type = 1 THEN lsn_count ELSE 0 END AS lsn_count1, CASE WHEN lesson_type = 2 THEN lsn_count ELSE 0 END AS lsn_count2, lsn_month FROM v_info_lsn_statistics_by_stuid WHERE stu_id = #{stuId} AND substring(lsn_month,1,4) = #{year} ) AS derived_table GROUP BY subject_id, subject_name, lsn_month ORDER BY subject_id, lsn_month;

SELECT pay.bank_id FROM t_info_lesson_pay pay INNER JOIN t_info_lesson_fee fee ON pay.lsn_fee_id = fee.lsn_fee_id LEFT JOIN t_info_lesson lsn ON fee.lesson_id = lsn.lesson_id LEFT JOIN t_info_lesson_tmp tmp ON fee.lesson_id = tmp.lsn_tmp_id WHERE COALESCE(lsn.stu_id, tmp.stu_id) = #{stuId} AND fee.lsn_month < #{currentMonth} ORDER BY fee.lsn_month DESC, pay.pay_date DESC LIMIT 1
